components.name: ZyfraPaginatorComponent

inputsClass.name: alwaysShow
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to show it even there is only one page.
inputsClass.description: Whether to show it even there is only one page.

inputsClass.name: currentPageReportTemplate
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Template of the current page report element.
Available placeholders are {currentPage},{totalPages},{rows},{first},{last} and {totalRecords}
inputsClass.description: Template of the current page report element. Available placeholders are {currentPage},{totalPages},{rows},{first},{last} and {totalRecords}

inputsClass.name: dropdownAppendTo
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Target element to attach the dropdown overlay, valid values are "body" or a local ng-template variable of another element
(note: use binding with brackets for template variables, e.g. [appendTo]="mydiv" for a div element having #mydiv as variable name).
inputsClass.description: Target element to attach the dropdown overlay, valid values are "body" or a local ng-template variable of another element (note: use binding with brackets for template variables, e.g. [appendTo]="mydiv" for a div element having #mydiv as variable name).

inputsClass.name: dropdownItemTemplate
inputsClass.rawdescription: Template instance to inject into the dropdown item inside in the paginator.
inputsClass.description: Template instance to inject into the dropdown item inside in the paginator.

inputsClass.name: dropdownScrollHeight
inputsClass.rawdescription: Dropdown height of the viewport in pixels, a scrollbar is defined if height of list exceeds this value.
inputsClass.description: Dropdown height of the viewport in pixels, a scrollbar is defined if height of list exceeds this value.

inputsClass.name: first
inputsClass.rawdescription: Zero-relative number of the first row to be displayed.
inputsClass.description: Zero-relative number of the first row to be displayed.

inputsClass.name: pageLinkSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Number of page links to display.

inputsClass.name: rows
inputsClass.rawdescription: Data count to display per page.

inputsClass.name: rowsPerPageOptions
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Array of integer/object values to display inside rows per page dropdown.
A object that have 'showAll' key can be added to it to show all data. Exp; [10,20,30,{showAll:'All'}]
inputsClass.description: Array of integer/object values to display inside rows per page dropdown. A object that have 'showAll' key can be added to it to show all data. Exp; [10,20,30,{showAll:'All'}]

inputsClass.name: showCurrentPageReport
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to display current page report.

inputsClass.name: showFirstLastIcon
inputsClass.rawdescription: When enabled, icons are displayed on paginator to go first and last page.
inputsClass.description: When enabled, icons are displayed on paginator to go first and last page.

inputsClass.name: showJumpToPageDropdown
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to display a dropdown to navigate to any page.
inputsClass.description: Whether to display a dropdown to navigate to any page.

inputsClass.name: showPageLinks
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to show page links.

inputsClass.name: style
inputsClass.rawdescription: Inline style of the component.

inputsClass.name: styleClass
inputsClass.rawdescription: Style class of the component.

inputsClass.name: templateLeft
inputsClass.rawdescription: Template instance to inject into the left side of the paginator.
inputsClass.description: Template instance to inject into the left side of the paginator.

inputsClass.name: templateRight
inputsClass.rawdescription: Template instance to inject into the right side of the paginator.
inputsClass.description: Template instance to inject into the right side of the paginator.

inputsClass.name: totalRecords
inputsClass.rawdescription: Number of total records.

components.name: ZyfraPasswordComponent
ZyfraProgressBarComponent
ZyfraRadioButtonComponent
ZyfraSelectButtonComponent
ZyfraSliderComponent
ZyfraSpinnerComponent
ZyfraSplitButtonComponent
ZyfraSplitterComponent

inputsClass.name: gutterSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Size of the divider in pixels.

inputsClass.name: layout
inputsClass.rawdescription: Orientation of the panels, valid values are "horizontal" and "vertical".
inputsClass.description: Orientation of the panels, valid values are "horizontal" and "vertical".

inputsClass.name: minSizes
inputsClass.rawdescription: Minimum size of the elements relative to 100%.
inputsClass.description: Minimum size of the elements relative to 100%.

inputsClass.name: panelSizes
inputsClass.rawdescription: Size of the elements relative to 100%.

inputsClass.name: panelStyle
inputsClass.rawdescription: Inline style of the pnanel.

inputsClass.name: panelStyleClass
inputsClass.rawdescription: Style class of the panel.

inputsClass.name: stateKey
inputsClass.rawdescription: Storage identifier of a stateful Splitter.

inputsClass.name: stateStorage
inputsClass.rawdescription: Defines where a stateful splitter keeps its state, valid values are "session" for sessionStorage and "local" for localStorage.
inputsClass.description: Defines where a stateful splitter keeps its state, valid values are "session" for sessionStorage and "local" for localStorage.

inputsClass.name: style
inputsClass.rawdescription: Inline style of the component.

inputsClass.name: styleClass
inputsClass.rawdescription: Style class of the component.

outputsClass.name: onResizeEnd
outputsClass.rawdescription: Callback to invoke when resize ends.

outputsClass.name: onResizeStart
outputsClass.rawdescription: Callback to invoke when resize starts.

components.templateData:
<p-splitter
  [panelSizes]="panelSizes"
  [minSizes]="minSizes"
  [layout]="layout"
  [gutterSize]="gutterSize"
  [stateKey]="stateKey"
  [stateStorage]="stateStorage"
  [style]="style"
  [styleClass]="styleClass"
  [panelStyleClass]="panelStyleClass"
  [panelStyle]="panelStyle"
  (onResizeStart)="onResizeStartHandler($event)"
  (onResizeEnd)="onResizeEnd.emit($event)"
>
  <ng-template pTemplate *ngFor="let item of panels; let i = index">
    <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="item"></ng-container>
  </ng-template>
</p-splitter>

variables.name: actions
variables.defaultValue:
{
  activeItemChange: action('activeItemChange'),
  homeClick: action('homeClick'),
  selectionChange: action('selectionChange'),
  nodeCollapse: action('nodeCollapse($event)'),
  nodeExpand: action('nodeExpand($event)'),
}

variables.name: basic
variables.defaultValue:
[
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 1'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 2',  routerLink: ['/page2']},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 3 длиннее остальных'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 4'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 5'},
]

variables.name: BasicTemplate
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template:
    `<zyfra-splitter layout="horizontal" [panelSizes]="[25,75]" [style]="{ height: '600px' }">
        <ng-template zyfraSplitterTemplate>
            <zyfra-nav-menu [model]="model"
                            [menuTitle]="menuTitle"
                            [headerConfig]="headerConfig"
                            [settingsConfig]="settingsConfig"
                            [toolbarConfig]="toolbarConfig"
                            [emptyMessage]="emptyMessage"
                            (activeItemChange)="activeItemChange($event)"
                            (selectionChange)="selectionChange($event)"
                            (homeClick)="homeClick($event)">
          </zyfra-nav-menu>
        </ng-template>
        <ng-template zyfraSplitterTemplate>
            <router-outlet></router-outlet>
        </ng-template>
    </zyfra-splitter>`,
  component: ZyfraNavMenuComponent,
  props: {
    ...args,
    ...actions
  },
})

variables.name: basicWithIcons
variables.defaultValue:
[
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 1', icon: 'zyfra-icon files-file'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 2', icon: 'zyfra-icon files-file'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 3 длиннее остальных', icon: 'zyfra-icon files-file',  routerLink: ['/page3']},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 4', icon: 'zyfra-icon files-file'},
  {label: 'Наименование ячейки 5', icon: 'zyfra-icon files-file'},
]

variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template:
    `<zyfra-splitter layout="horizontal" [panelSizes]="[25,75]" [style]="{ height: '600px' }">
        <ng-template zyfraSplitterTemplate>
            <zyfra-nav-menu [menuTitle]="menuTitle"
                            [emptyMessage]="emptyMessage"
                            [headerConfig]="headerConfig"
                            [settingsConfig]="settingsConfig"
                            [toolbarConfig]="toolbarConfig"
                            [searchPlaceholder]="searchPlaceholder"
                            (homeClick)="homeClick($event)"
                            (activeItemChange)="activeItemChange($event)"
                            (nodeCollapse)="nodeCollapse($event)"
                            (nodeExpand)="nodeExpand($event)"
                            (selectionChange)="selectionChange($event)">
            <ng-template zyfraNavMenuGroup
                         [header]="header1"
                         [items]="items1"></ng-template>
              
            <ng-template zyfraNavMenuGroup
                         [header]="header2"
                         [items]="items2"></ng-template>
            
            <ng-template zyfraNavMenuGroup
                         [header]="header3"
                         [items]="items3"></ng-template>
            </zyfra-nav-menu>
        </ng-template>
        <ng-template zyfraSplitterTemplate>
            <router-outlet></router-outlet>
        </ng-template>
    </zyfra-splitter>`,
  component: ZyfraNavMenuComponent,
  props: {
    ...args,
    ...actions
  },
})

variables.name: Template
Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-button
      (click)="confirmDialog.onClick($event)"
      label="for dialog"
      icon="zyfra-icon selection-check-simple"
    ></zyfra-button>

    <zyfra-confirm-dialog
      #confirmDialog
      [message]="message"
      [icon]="icon"
      [header]="header"
      [acceptLabel]="acceptLabel"
      [rejectLabel]="rejectLabel"
      [acceptButtonStyleClass]="acceptButtonStyleClass"
      [rejectButtonStyleClass]="rejectButtonStyleClass"
      [acceptMessages]="acceptMessages"
      (onHide)="onHide($event)"
    ></zyfra-confirm-dialog>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
    onHide: action('onHide'),
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-button
      (click)="dialog.onInit($event)"
      label="for dialog"
      icon="zyfra-icon selection-check-simple"
    ></zyfra-button>

    <zyfra-dialog
      #dialog
      [header]="header"
      [htmlTemplate]="htmlTemplate"
      (onShow)="onShow($event)"
      (onHide)="onHide($event)"
      (onResizeInit)="onResizeInit($event)"
      (onResizeEnd)="onResizeEnd($event)"
      (onDragEnd)="onDragEnd($event)"
      (onMaximize)="onMaximize($event)"
    ></zyfra-dialog>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
    onResizeInit: action('onResizeInit'),
    onResizeEnd: action('onResizeEnd'),
    onDragEnd: action('onDragEnd'),
    onMaximize: action('onMaximize'),
    onShow: action('onShow'),
    onHide: action('onHide'),
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue: (args: ZyfraAccordionComponent) => ({ template: ` Content 1 {{dynamicString}} header Content 2 {{dynamicString}} body Content 2 template header content template body content `, props: { ...args, selectedChange: action('selectedChange'), onOpen: action('onOpen'), onClose: action('onClose'), activeIndexChange: action('activeIndexChange'), mouseover(): void { // для теста нормально ли подхватывается новый таб и учавствует модели. метод activeIndexChange должен выдавать правильную модель this.showThirdForReInitTabTest = true; } } })

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-tab-view
      [class]="zyfraTabViewTagStyle"
      [activeIndex]="activeIndex"
      [controlClose]="controlClose"
      [style]="style"
      [styleClass]="styleClass"
      (onChange)="onChangeHandler($event)"
      (onClose)="onCloseHandler($event)"
    >
      <ng-container *ngFor="let tab of tabs">
        <zyfra-tab-panel
          [header]="tab.header"
          [selected]="tab.selected"
          [disabled]="tab.disabled"
          [closable]="tab.closable"
          [leftIcon]="tab.leftIcon"
          [rightIcon]="tab.rightIcon"
          [headerStyle]="tab.headerStyle"
          [headerStyleClass]="tab.headerStyleClass"
          [cache]="tab.cache"
          [tooltip]="tab.tooltip"
          [tooltipPosition]="tab.tooltipPosition"
          [tooltipStyleClass]="tab.tooltipStyleClass"
        >
          {{ tab.content }}
        </zyfra-tab-panel>
      </ng-container>
    </zyfra-tab-view>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
  },
})

libs/components/src/lib/tab-view/zyfra-t.name: CustomWithBadge
libs/components/src/lib/tab-view/zyfra-t.defaultValue:
(args) => ({ props: { ...args, }, template: `
{{tab?.header}}
 {{tab.content}} `, })

libs/components/src/lib/tab-view/zyfra-t.name: Template
libs/components/src/lib/tab-view/zyfra-t.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-tab-view
      [class]="zyfraTabViewTagStyle"
      [activeIndex]="activeIndex"
      [controlClose]="controlClose"
      [style]="style"
      [styleClass]="styleClass"
      (onChange)="onChangeHandler($event)"
      (onClose)="onCloseHandler($event)"
    >
      <ng-container *ngFor="let tab of tabs">
        <zyfra-tab-panel
          [header]="tab.header"
          [selected]="tab.selected"
          [disabled]="tab.disabled"
          [closable]="tab.closable"
          [leftIcon]="tab.leftIcon"
          [rightIcon]="tab.rightIcon"
          [headerStyle]="tab.headerStyle"
          [headerStyleClass]="tab.headerStyleClass"
          [cache]="tab.cache"
          [tooltip]="tab.tooltip"
          [tooltipPosition]="tab.tooltipPosition"
          [tooltipStyleClass]="tab.tooltipStyleClass"
        >
          {{ tab.content }}
        </zyfra-tab-panel>
      </ng-container>
    </zyfra-tab-view>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
  },
})

libs/components/src/lib/confirm-dialog/z.name: Template
libs/components/src/lib/confirm-dialog/z.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-button
      (click)="confirmDialog.onClick($event)"
      label="for dialog"
      icon="zyfra-icon selection-check-simple"
    ></zyfra-button>

    <zyfra-confirm-dialog
      #confirmDialog
      [message]="message"
      [icon]="icon"
      [header]="header"
      [acceptLabel]="acceptLabel"
      [rejectLabel]="rejectLabel"
      [acceptButtonStyleClass]="acceptButtonStyleClass"
      [rejectButtonStyleClass]="rejectButtonStyleClass"
      [acceptMessages]="acceptMessages"
      (onHide)="onHide($event)"
    ></zyfra-confirm-dialog>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
    onHide: action('onHide'),
  },
})

libs/components/src/lib/dialog/zyfra-dia.name: Template
libs/components/src/lib/dialog/zyfra-dia.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  template: `
    <zyfra-button
      (click)="dialog.onInit($event)"
      label="for dialog"
      icon="zyfra-icon selection-check-simple"
    ></zyfra-button>

    <zyfra-dialog
      #dialog
      [header]="header"
      [htmlTemplate]="htmlTemplate"
      (onShow)="onShow($event)"
      (onHide)="onHide($event)"
      (onResizeInit)="onResizeInit($event)"
      (onResizeEnd)="onResizeEnd($event)"
      (onDragEnd)="onDragEnd($event)"
      (onMaximize)="onMaximize($event)"
    ></zyfra-dialog>
  `,
  props: {
    ...args,
    onResizeInit: action('onResizeInit'),
    onResizeEnd: action('onResizeEnd'),
    onDragEnd: action('onDragEnd'),
    onMaximize: action('onMaximize'),
    onShow: action('onShow'),
    onHide: action('onHide'),
  },
})
